nodes.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company
nodes.short_description: Fabs Apple-designed A/M processors for iPad; capacity and process advances directly determine performance and release t…

nodes.title: Foxconn
nodes.short_description: Primary iPad final assembler; production capacity, yields, and China operations directly affect supply and lead times.

nodes.title: Pegatron
nodes.short_description: Major iPad assembler; diversification and capacity influence availability and regional manufacturing risk.

nodes.title: Samsung Display
nodes.short_description: Supplies advanced OLED/LCD panels; panel tech and yields drive iPad display quality, cost, and timing.

nodes.title: LG Display
nodes.short_description: Key iPad display supplier; tandem OLED and LCD capacity influence performance and launch schedules.

nodes.title: Qualcomm
nodes.short_description: Provides cellular modems for iPad; 5G/LTE roadmap dictates connectivity capabilities and certification timing.

nodes.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab
nodes.short_description: Leading Android tablet competitor, shaping iPad pricing, features, and market share.

nodes.title: Microsoft Surface
nodes.short_description: 2-in-1 Windows competitor influencing iPad Pro positioning, accessories, and productivity features.

nodes.title: Chromebooks
nodes.short_description: Dominant low-cost devices in education, directly impacting iPad adoption and procurement.

nodes.title: Education technology (K–12)
nodes.short_description: Institutional purchasing and standards drive iPad deployments, app requirements, and accessories.

nodes.title: China
nodes.short_description: Primary iPad manufacturing base; labor, regulation, and lockdowns directly affect production.

nodes.title: Vietnam
nodes.short_description: Alternative iPad assembly location; capacity expansion reduces China concentration risk.

nodes.title: Digital Markets Act
nodes.short_description: EU regulation forcing app store and platform changes on iPad, affecting distribution and monetization.

nodes.title: U.S.-China trade war
nodes.short_description: Tariffs and policy tensions driving supply-chain shifts, costs, and production location decisions for iPad.

nodes.title: COVID-19 pandemic
nodes.short_description: Global demand spike and factory disruptions causing volatile iPad supply and logistics constraints.
